title: ahmad12350
author: ahmad12350
content: What is InQubeta?The revolutionary platform that lets you invest in the future of AI technology. With $QUBE, the world's first AI crypto crowdfunding platform, you can easily and securely invest in AI start-ups and help shape the next generation of tech innovation.Through our innovative fractional investment system, you can own a piece of the action in some of the most exciting and promising AI start-ups in the world.With each investment opportunity minted into an NFT and fractionalised, you'll be able to invest in a way that suits your budget, all while enjoying the benefits of being an early backer. At InQubeta, we believe in transparency, fairness, and community engagement. That's why we've designed our platform to give you access to all the information you need to make informed investment decisions. Our online Marketplace makes it easy for AI start-ups to apply for listing, and for you to review and evaluate each project before pledging your QUBE tokens.We're also introducing a unique system of reward and equity based NFTs that lets you share in the success of the start-ups you invest in. As a token holder, you'll be entitled to a range of rewards and benefits, including early access to new projects, exclusive discounts, and much more.So, whether you're an AI enthusiast, a seasoned investor, or simply looking for a new and exciting way to invest your crypto assets, InQubeta is the platform for you. Join us today and be part of the future of AI technology.Contract Address0xe77473c4973ad064e04c80959dd56dd4886efca9 NFT MarketplaceInQubeta's NFT marketplace enables AI start-ups to mint investment opportunities into NFTs, which can be listed on our platform for QUBE token holders to invest in. Each investment opportunity is divided into fractional NFTs, making it easy for investors to invest according to their budget. As projects grow and develop, investors can earn rewards and benefits through equity-based NFTs.StakingBy staking $QUBE tokens, investors can earn rewards from our 5% sell tax, which goes to a dedicated reward pool. Staking provides a unique opportunity for our community to earn $QUBE token rewards while supporting the growth of AI technology start-ups.GovernanceQUBE token is designed to act as a governance token, empowering its holders to actively participate in the decision-making processes of the platform. As a governance token, $QUBE holders will have the ability to propose, discuss, and vote on various aspects related to the platform's development, operation, and future direction. InQubeta is creating a more democratic and community-driven ecosystem. This function encourages active participation from token holders, allowing them to shape the platform's future and contribute to the growth and success of AI technology start-ups.Telegram: https://t.me/Inqubeta Discord: https://discord.com/invite/fKknYbzSfQ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@InquBeta Twitter: https://twitter.com/inqubetahq Website: https://inqubeta.ai/ Medium: https://medium.com/@inqubeta
